p: Although, many studies have suggested the prognosis of confirmed MERS-Cov and the contribution of underlying comorbidities on the severity of the disease, yet no studies have highlighted the characteristics of those who tested positive with RT-PCR test among suspected cases, especially the contribution of medications. Thus, it is the intent of this paper is to identify factors associated with the MERS-CoV confirmation among suspected cases and impact on medications history on virus transmission.
